Reviews.Title: No screen display!!
Reviews.Author: Paula
Reviews.Content: Just purchased the Galaxy S4 on 12/19 received it yesterday 12/26. Today 12/27 I went to T-Mobile to purchase SIM & SD cards for the phone & a plan of my choice. Guess what? Phone was fully charged and went turned on the screen showed no display just a black screen. I just e-mailed Amazon for a return & credit to my account. What a shame!

Reviews.Title: Never experienced any problems
Reviews.Author: Mari Claire
Reviews.Content: I've already used this phone for almost six months now and accidentally dropped it twice with no covering protection. So far, so good and still have not experienced any problems with my device until now. Screen is larger than my iPhone3 and data processing is quite up to speed.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous phone, timely delivery
Reviews.Author: JP
Reviews.Content: The phone came sealed in box with all accessories. Product works great. Seller was fantastic.Anyone looking for a quality android experience should get this phone. Removable battery, SD Card and a few other features are what makes this phone better than the competition, such as the HTC One and the LG G2.

Reviews.Title: I was sold either a stolen phone or this seller scammed me
Reviews.Author: Lara Theodore
Reviews.Content: I bought this Galaxy S4 and it seemed to be in great condition, and after using it for a week or so It just cut out, telling me I had no service. I took it to T-mobile and they tried everything they could do, only to find out that the IMEI number had been reported stolen or lost and that terminates the use of the phone. So here I am with a $500 phone that cannot be used. All I can say is that whoever sold me this phone either scammed me and reported it lost, or they stole the phone and sold it to me on amazon. I will never buy from them again.

Reviews.Title: Fragile phone
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: This phone was everything I was looking for in a phone. Fast, reliable, and I loved the new features. My previous phone was an s2 and I had it for 2 years and loved it. I saved up the money for an s4, got it, and then spent a good month worshiping it. Here's the bad part. This phone is very fragile. I have had it in a case since the day I got it, and I have never dropped it. One day the screen stopped working and turned green so I wasn't able to see anything. Luckily I was able to hook it up to my pc and save the pictures I had on it. I contacted samsung and they send it to them and since it's still under warranty they'll fix it. I sent it to them and then they told me they found LCD damage and they're wanting me to pay $200 to fix it. I have not damaged the phone in any way. Google the screen issue and you find loads of other people with the same issue. My friend is from another country and he told me the s4 is plagued with issues there. So I will advise you people looking to upgrade your phone to look away. Maybe they'll find a fix for this issue, maybe not. But for now I would advise you to try something else.

Reviews.Title: Good as Advertised
Reviews.Author: jcorrales
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived sooner than expected. It did not come in a box therefore I reduced it by one star. The pictures implies there is a box with accessories but there was none. The phone does work well though so its a keeper.

Reviews.Title: Just Like Brand New !
Reviews.Author: Sheena Alexander
Reviews.Content: The phone looked like a brand new phone..  Everything was packed well. It was functional. I received it very quickly. I would recommend to buy from them.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Eddie
Reviews.Content: I love my samsung galaxy S4  great product very dependable and reliable great system build in, and easy to use with no issues.

Reviews.Title: Great device overall
Reviews.Author: Anthony Lado
Reviews.Content: I received the device in the condition i expected it in, and it performs perfectly.Few scratches where the camera is, but not an issue at all. Loving the phone, thank you very much!!

Reviews.Title: New Android
Reviews.Author: Carroll
Reviews.Content: Selected the Samsung Galaxy S4 since I loved my Samsung Galaxy S2, before it went whacko. This phone is not as simple and has a lot of useless Tmobile apps. Once set-up the way you want it, seems to be equal may-be better than my S2. Still new so will have to get back to you. Would be nice to have loaded some decent ringtones.

Reviews.Title: was used, but its a great product if new
Reviews.Author: Isaak Niyazov
Reviews.Content: the phone is great if it would be brand NEW, but mine was not working....  I also bought the S4 and the S5

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone
Reviews.Author: rpv

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo1RRH5W5MWRQ39currentClick) { return cv_mo1RRH5W5MWRQ39currentClick(); } } } Length:: 5:26 MinsUPDATE 3/8/2014:My battery in S4 died less than a year old. I had purchased online, so it was international i9500. Battery bulged and had standard issue that is widely reported in the press. I called Samsung USA. They refuse to change the battery and say that it is international. The phone is British EU based. I checked with IMEI number also. Samsung US claims the phone is from Syria! and refuse to replace the battery. Well that's it for customer Service. So warning that the international phones have no warranty!UPDATE: 10/8/2013:An updated NFC Tag from Whiztags is just awesome, has 450 bytes of memory and I use several of those in office and home with my Samsung Galaxy S4 NFC tags - Topaz 512 Chip - 10 Pack + Keychain + Free Bonus Tag - Android Writeable & Programmable - Adhesive Sticker Back - Samsung Galaxy S4 S3 Note 3 - HTC One First One X Droid DNA - Sony Xperia - Nexus - Smart Tags - Best Money-Back Guarantee!I have been using TechMatteTM Qi-compatible Wireless Charger for the Nexus 4, HTC 8X, HTC Droid DNA, Nokia Lumia 920, LG Optimus Vu2 (With AC Adapter and Micro USB Cable). and TechMatteTM Qi-standard Wireless Charger Receiver Coil for SAMSUNG Galaxy S4 SIV for wireless charging and they are very convenient for charging by placing on the mat.UPDATE 9/15/2013:I thought I will update since it's been a while. We have two Galaxy S4 in the family. One black and one white both unlocked. There has been few firmware updates to the 9500 International series. I have been asked about the heat issue. Other than normal electronic heating feeling, it does NOT get super hot etc. In the initial days some people had issues, but apparently firmware has patched it. Version 4.2.2, BUILD: JDQ39.I9500XXUAMDX. Kernel 3.4.5-526212. I use Battery Widget Pro and has been watching battery usage. Easily for a day with normal usage. If I use video streaming and use NAVIGON indiscriminately, of course battery usage will shot down. Camera app does crash with latest updates. If I don't use camera for a day and use it, sometimes it crashes and phone reboots. After that no issue in subsequent sessions. I have been using NFC a lot. I got the WhizTags NFC tags - NTAG203 Chip - 10 Pack + Keychain + Free Bonus Tag - Android Writable & Programmable - Adhesive Sticker Back - Samsung Galaxy S4 S3 Note 2 - HTC One First One X Droid DNA - Sony Xperia - Nexus - Smart Tags - Best Money-Back Guarantee! which is awesome. I use in conjunction with NFC Task Launcher App. Samsung also has TecTiles App. When I go to office I tap a NFC Tag to get the settings I desire - eg vibrate, wifi on etc. At CAR different instructions and so on.Get a spare battery if you are using phone in an intense manner or if you are on long road trips or for just peace of mind. Timetec 2*2600mAh High Capacity Li-ion Battery for Samsung Galaxy S4 S IV SIV, I9500. Samsung Galaxy GT-I9500, Verizon SCH-I545, AT&T; SGH-I337, Sprint SPH-L720+Free Bonus TimeTecTM Multi-purpose USB Travel Charger is a great choice.Another great gadget to have in your backpack while traveling or at home is an excellen remote for this phone. Yes a remote for media and camera. I have reviewed it at Satechi BT MediaRemote Bluetooth Multi-Media Remote Control (White) for Samsung Galaxy S2, S3, S4 / Note, Note II / Galaxy Tab / Galaxy NexusORIGINAL REVIEWGalaxy S4 is an incredible phone. I have been using this unlocked S4 for past 2 days helping a friend to migrate from iPhone 4S. My friend has been on iPhone and it also gave me a unique perspective. I used iPhone for couple of years and been using Android for past 3+ years.I have used Galaxy S3, Note II and for me S4 is more like a S3s :) If you have a Galaxy S3, it is perfect and there is no need to move to S4. The new features are more like minor upgrades for me. Just like Detroit rolls out new cars every year, phone manufacturers have found excellent way to make yearly upgrades.Battery came for almost a day. The video playback was crisp and my friend was amazed at the customization options. It is heaven for a iphone user to come out of shackles and explores the wonderful world of Android. It sure sounds like it is for geeks, but Samsung has created lot of ways to simplify and make it less intimidating. The EASY mode is for one such reason. Samsung's addition of all those apps (commonly referred as crapware) is not as bad as HTC or LG. Android experience is classified as pure vanilla in phones like Nexus. Vendors like Samsung have added a whole lot of extra programs.5" HD Super AMOLED 1920 x 1080 display (441 ppi) is just plain gorgeous. 13 MP camera takes ginormous image sizes. I put a 64 GB microSDXC card SanDisk 64GB Mobile Ultra MicroSDXC Class 6 Memory Card with SD Adapter - Retail Packaging as my friend wants to take lot of movies (built-in 2 GB RAM, 16 GB ROM). No stuttering, and very smooth playback of videos captured in varying light conditions (HD Playback; HD Recording). Compatible video types are AVI/DIVX, WMV/ASF, FLV, MKV, MP4/3GP, WEBM. HDR and Panaromic photos were incredibly sharp. Compatible audio types are: AAC, AMR, MP3, OGG, WMA/ASF, 3GA/M4A, FLAC, WAV. Google Music, PlayerPro Music player are producing excellent music. Audio/Video is one section where S4 has nudged S3. For a normal user, if you are not into lot of video processing this does not matter.S4's infrared sensor is the same technology as TV remote control, so with WatchON you can change the TV channel from your phone. My friend was shocked to see this feature. Having used Android for a long time, I explored all new features one by one. My friend is still getting used to and feels this is too complicated. I broke down into lot of sub features and told my friend he may not use 50% of features, but told him to explore one feature at a time and focus on that.Games were very buttery, this phones runs ARM®-based octa-core mobile CPU. This is apparently world's first! Inside this chip is Imagination Technologies' PowerVR SGX544MP3 GPU. I tried several car racing games and performance was phenomenal. People on the XDA-Developers forum report seeing smearing and ghosting when scrolling on the phone. This especially occurs to people when scrolling among darker colors, which begin showing up as purple. I tried hard to see if I could on the S4 I was testing with my friend and I could not see it. I am sure these can be upgraded with software over due course.Air View and Air Gestures - are they worth it? Air view is similar to how the S-pen on the Galaxy Note 8 works. Simply hover finger a few millimeters above the screen and in supported apps, you'll see a preview of content. This works with many of Samsung's built-in apps, including the photo gallery, the dialer, Samsung's browser and email client. It also works with Flipboard. Air View works by cranking up the capacitive sensor on the screen. Another new feature is Air Gestures. This uses the IR sensor on the top of the phone to detect movement by your palm or finger. One can flip between open tabs in Samsung's browser app, skip to a new song in the music player and do many other things. I say these are still in works and sometimes not very efficient.GPS was spot on and I tried multiple GPS apps. It was bright outdoors (had to crank the brightness all the way up). I tried multiple apps to demonstrate to my friend. In the end, my friend was impressed with what all Android and in particular S4 had to offer. Smooth and Stunning display!I tried following apps and they just worked awesome.Amazon MobileAndroid StatusAndroidifyAngry Birds (Space/Seasons)Asphalt 7Amazon App StoreBoxCar Maintenance Reminder ProChromeCNET TVNAVIGON (from Garmin - offline maps)Google Navigation/Earth/MapsGoogle Currents (nice way to read News)Draw SomethingGoogle DriveEbayLinkedinGoogle MusicTapatalk (awesome forum browsing app)OverDrive Media Console: Library eBooks & Audiobooks (public library consumption of media)Microsoft One Note (legacy docs, skydrive of 25 GB is good)Subsonic Music StreamerTerminal Emulator (still need to use vi, yes this is it)TweetCaster Pro for Android (excellent twitter client)Twit.TvTriggerGoogle VoicePlenty of WidgetsAsk questions, the review cannot do justice to Galaxy S4. I will be glad to answer any questions.

Reviews.Title: Short of Note 3, this is awesome
Reviews.Author: tymewarrp
Reviews.Content: I was a first adopter of the phone, so I have logged a lot of hours on this bad girl, and she has not failed me yet. It organizes all that I need, takes great pictures, and is pound for pound one of the best phones I have ever owned, with the accessories out of the box, you cannot help but love it from the start. Trust me, except for the Note 3, this is your best chance at owning a truly great phone.

Reviews.Title: This is the best phone I have ever owned
Reviews.Author: Isaac Graves
Reviews.Content: The screen is simply amazing, the cpu speed will blow you away, and the battery lasts for days! There is not a better phone out there, I highly recommend it.

ProductInfo.Features:
With its 5-inch full HD super AMOLED display, the Samsung Galaxy S 4 SGH-M919 smartphone is truly a delight to watch
The Samsung Galaxy S4 has fast 1.9 GHz speed, quadcore processor, so the multitasking goes easily, without any problem
This smartphone has 16 GB internal memory, which can be further upgraded with a microSD card
Take brilliant photos with its 13 MP camera, and make video calls with the 2 MP front camera
The Galaxy S 4 is also equipped with WiFi and Bluetooth connection so you can transfer multimedia and chat with friends all the time
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy S4 M919 - White Frost T-Mobile 4G LTE Capable US Version
